channel.title: dividend stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in dividend stocks on FinanClub

item.title: NYCB
item.description: score:1065 Chances: Highlighting high-yield dividend stocks with rapid growth, where UWM Holdings ranks as a leading mortgage lender. Announcing the hiring of Michele Celestino as EVP and Head of Commercial and Private Banking, Southeast at Flagstar Bank, N.A., a subsidiary of NYCB. Announcing the successful completion of Flagstar Bank’s MortgageTech Accelerator program by fintech graduates.

item.title: AGNC
item.description: score:935 Chances: Highlighting AGNC Investment Corp. as one of the best monthly dividend stocks to buy according to analysts. Exploring high-yield dividend stocks with an average yield of almost 11.1% and their potential for consistent income. Announcing AGNC’s declaration of a cash dividend of $0.

item.title: ABEV
item.description: score:274 Chances: Comparisons of Ambev with other stocks like DEO and CABGY in terms of value could highlight its investment potential. Tracking Ambev’s performance compared to Beyond Meat and other stocks within the sector provides insights into its relative strength. Exploring dividend penny stocks and identifying Ambev as a potential candidate for investment.

item.title: VZ
item.description: score:50 Chances: Verizon is contributing $100,000 to the Hawai`i Community Foundation in support of the Maui Strong Fund. Verizon Business forms a global strategic partnership with HCLTech for managed network services. High-dividend stocks under $10 are discussed, with Verizon being mentioned as a high-dividend stock.

item.title: ET
item.description: score:890 Chances: Energy Transfer reports strong performance in operations with record volumes, including NGL exports. Ares Capital offers a high dividend yield of nearly 9.7%, attracting investors seeking income. Energy Transfer’s expanded operations in the Permian Basin and strong export volumes likely benefit Q2 earnings.
